queries.fetchCommissions: SELECT COUNT(*) totalCount, COALESCE(SUM(c.commission_amount),0) totalAmount FROM Commissions c
queries.fetchAllData: SELECT c.commissionsID commissionId, c.order_id orderId, c.internal_partner_id internalPartnerId, c.commission_rate commissionRate, c.commission_amount commissionAmount, c.status, c.createdAt, o.external_order_id externalOrderId FROM Commissions c LEFT JOIN Orders o ON o.orderID = c.order_id
queries.insertOrders: INSERT INTO Orders (external_order_id, affiliate_id, amount, status) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
queries.fetchLatestOrderID: SELECT orderID FROM Orders ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1;
queries.insertCommissions: INSERT INTO Commissions (order_id, internal_partner_id, commission_rate, commission_amount, status) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
